hero.title: Capture Moments with Your Photocard
hero.subtitle: Make every day special with your bias
hero.description: Phocam lets you take photos with your precious photocards. Create beautiful manner shots, effortlessly.

multipleCards.title: Add Multiple Cards
multipleCards.description: Add as many of your favorite photocards as you want and save them for easy access.

easyCapture.title: Easy Capture
easyCapture.description: Launch the camera, overlay your photocard, adjust size and position, and capture the perfect shot.

flexibleSize.title: Flexible Sizing
flexibleSize.description: Adjust photocard size from 0.5x to 5x to match any scene.

shareEasily.title: Save & Share
shareEasily.description: Easily save and share your photos. Post on social media and enjoy with fellow fans.

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.subtitle: Simple interface you can understand at a glance

footer.description: Make every day special with your bias
